id.description: the id of the entity type

type.description: the name of the entity type

traceId.description: (REQUIRED) The Correlation ID provided by the Gateway. It is also a unique identifier for this particular occurrence of the problem.

type.description: (REQUIRED) The classification of the error

code.description: (REQUIRED) A machine-readable unique error code, expressed as a string value. The format used must be kebab-case.

instance.description: (REQUIRED) A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem

title.description: (RECOMMENDED) A short, human-readable summary of the problem type

detail.description: (RECOMMENDED) A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem

source.description: (OPTIONAL) A machine-readable structure to reference to the exact location(s) causing the error(s)

stackTrace.description: (NEVER IN PRODUCTION) A human-readable stacktrace produced by the implementation technology

categoryName.description: The name of the Category to which the Category Bid has been applied.

bidAmount.description: The Bid amount applied to the given Category associated to an Ad Set. At most 4 decimals are supported. Additional decimals are rounded.

AdSetCategoryBid.description: Category Bid information about a Category for a given Ad Set.

categoryName.description: The name of the Category to which the given for which the Display Multiplier has been applied.

displayMultiplier.description: The Display Multiplier applied to the given Category associated to an Ad Set.

AdSetDisplayMultiplier.description: Display Multiplier information about a Category for a given Ad Set.

datasetId.description: Dataset id of this ad set

campaignId.description: Campaign id this ad set belongs to

trackingCode.description: The click tracking code associated to this Ad Set.

mediaType.description: Media type for the ad set

bidAmount.description: The Bid amount applied to the given Category associated to an Ad Set. At most 4 decimals are supported. Additional decimals are rounded.

PatchAdSetCategoryBid.description: Category Bid to update for a given combination of Ad Set and Category.

displayMultiplier.description: Any positive decimal value. To remove the impact of the Display Multiplier set it to 1. At most 4 decimals are supported. Additional decimals are rounded.

PatchAdSetDisplayMultiplier.description: Display Multiplier to update for a given combination of Ad Set and Category.

advertiserId.description: Advertiser id this campaign belongs to

bidStrategy.description: The intended optimization for the Ad Set

bidAmount.description: Decimal value target relating to the `bidStrategy` specified. May be `null` for strategies that do not require a target value. At most 4 decimals are supported. Additional decimals are rounded.

spendLimitType.description: Whether your spend limit is capped or not

spendLimitRenewal.description: The pace of the spend limit renewal

spendLimitAmount.description: The amount of the spend limit. null if spendLimitType is uncapped.

creativeId.description: The id of the Creative binded to this Ad

adSetId.description: The id of the Ad Set binded to this Ad

inventoryType.description: The inventory the Ad belongs to. Possible values are "Display" and "Native". This is optional since this doesn't make sense for every creative type but will throw an error if not set for a dynamic creative.

startDate.description:
The date when the ad will be launched
String must be in ISO8601 format

endDate.description:
The date when when we will stop to show this ad. If the end date is not specified (i.e. null) then the ad will go on forever
String must be in ISO8601 format

Ad.description: An ad is the binding that connects a creative with an ad set

author.description: The login of the person who created this Coupon

adSetId.description: The id of the Ad Set on which the Coupon is applied to

landingPageUrl.description: Web redirection of the landing page url

startDate.description:
The date when the Coupon will be launched
String must be in ISO8601 format

endDate.description:
The date when when we will stop to show this Coupon. If the end date is not specified (i.e. null) then the Coupon will go on forever
String must be in ISO8601 format

format.description: Format of the Coupon, it can have two values: "FullFrame" or "LogoZone"

images.description: List of slides containing the image URLs

showEvery.description: Show the Coupon every N seconds (between 1 and 10)

showDuration.description: Show Coupon for a duration of N seconds (between 1 and 5)

rotationsNumber.description: Number of rotations for the Coupons (from 1 to 10 times)

Coupon.description: Coupons are static images applied on ad set which can be displayed within an ad and link to a landing page.

logoZone.description: Array of LogoZone sizes as string in width x height format

fullFrame.description: Array of FullFrame sizes as string in width x height format

callsToAction.description:
A Call-to-Action (CTA) is an action-driven instruction to your audience intended to provoke an immediate
response, such as “Buy now” or “Go!”.

productImageDisplay.description:
Value can be "ShowFullImage" or "ZoomOnImage". Choose whether your product catalog images should fit inside the allocated
space ("ShowFullImage") or whether they should fill that space ("ZoomOnImage"). If you choose ZoomOnImage, there may be some
image cropping.

errors.description:
Error list returned by the Criteo API
For successful requests it is empty

warnings.description:
Warnings list returned by the Criteo API
In some situations the operations are successful but it may be useful to issue warnings to the API consumer.
For example the endpoint, entity or field is deprecated. Warnings are like compiler warnings, they indicate that problems may occur in the future.

type.description: A string containing the entity type

id.description: A opaque string containing the unique Id of the entity

meta.description: A meta object that contains application-specific metadata

EntityOfPortfolioMessage.description: Generic Criteo API successful data model

traceId.description: The correlation ID provided by the gateway

type.description: A machine-readable code specifying error category

code.description: A machine-readable error code string in kabab-case. Unique across Criteo

instance.description: A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem

title.description: A short, human-readable remarks of the problem type.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

source.description: A machine-readable structure to reference to the exact location(s) causing the error(s).
